Specimen Type: Vesicle fluid, lesion swabs, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), tissue samples
Purpose: To detect Herpes Simplex Virus DNA in clinical specimens using real-time PCR for accurate and timely diagnosis.
Container: Sterile container appropriate for specimen type (e.g., swab in viral transport medium or sterile screw-cap tube)
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500 Fast) and automated DNA extraction system (e.g., Qiagen QIAcube)
